message.raw:
Compute quickstep pgs residual on the fly (disable CHECK_VELOCITY_OBEYS_CONSTRAINT option which computes residual = Jv without correct projections).
To do this, needed to pass Ad into row sweep computation udpates and scale dlambda by 1/Ad.
Change sor_lcp_tolerance check to test against residuals insteady of dlambdas.
